name: The Ultimate Film Quotes Quiz |  Quotes from Movies

questions.text: 'Austin Powers: the Spy Who Shagged Me': 'I got your hat! I got your hat!'
questions.explanation:
Dr. Evil

	On 'Jerry Springer', as Dr. Evil grabs a KKK guy's hood.

questions.text: 'The Matrix': 'Buckle your seatbelt Dorothy, 'cause Kansas is going bye-bye.'
questions.explanation:
Cypher.

	Cypher is thought to be a good guy at first, but later we learn his true allegiance...

questions.text: 'Star Wars: A New Hope':  [Approaching the Death Star] 'I've got a bad feeling about this.'
'The Green Mile': 'Sometimes the green mile seems oh so long.'
questions.explanation:
Old Paul.

	As he narrates the story.

questions.text: 'The Big Lebowski': 'You want a toe? I can get you a toe, believe me. There are ways, Dude. You don't want to know about it, believe me.'

'Robin Hood: Men in Tights': 'This never would have happened if your father had been here.' 'He's dead?' 'Yes.' 'And my mother?' 'She died of pneumonia while -- while you were away.' 'My dog Pongo?' 'Run over by a carriage.' 'My goldfish Goldie?' 'Eaten by the cat.' 'My - my cat?' 'Choked on the goldfish. It's great to be home, isn't it?'
questions.explanation:
Robin Hood and Blinkin'.

	The conversation when Robin returns home from The Crusades.

questions.text: 'Aladdin': 'Wow! That's a big surprise! I think I'm going to have a heart attack and die from that surprise.'
questions.explanation:
Iago.

	After Jafar says 'Gazeem was obviously less than worthy.'

questions.text: 'What About Bob?': 'I feel good... I feel great... I feel wonderful... I feel good... I feel great... I feel wonderful...'
questions.explanation:
Bob.

	As he gets up and as he goes to work.

questions.text: 'The Wizard of Oz': 'It's just that she doesn't like little green worms.'
questions.explanation:
The Scarecrow.

	Arguing with the apple tree.

questions.text: 'Without a Clue': 'I seem to have overestimated the amount of rope needed...'
questions.explanation:
Sherlock Holmes.

	After his failed attempt to hang himself.
